com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.touch.pageobjects.touchui

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.touch.pageobjects.touchui.Component

  • public class Component
extends Object
    Class representing page component.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Component() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(ComponentConfiguration config)
      Method configures component using given map of fields configuration.
      void delete()
      Method selects delete option on component toolbar, then confirms if the component is deleted and not visible.
      String getDataPath() 
      ConfigDialog openDialog()
      Method opens dialog to enable further configuration by single fields
      ComponentToolbar select()
      Method verifies if the component is displayed, clicks on it and verifies if component toolbar is now displayed.
      void verifyIsDisplayed()
      Method makes ajax post call to ensure if component is displayed.
      void verifyIsHidden()
      Method makes ajax post call to ensure if component is hidden.

        public ComponentToolbar select()
        Method verifies if the component is displayed, clicks on it and verifies if component toolbar is now displayed.
        Returns:

      • configure

        public void configure(ComponentConfiguration config)
        Method configures component using given map of fields configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - map of list configurations.

      • openDialog

        public ConfigDialog openDialog()
        Method opens dialog to enable further configuration by single fields
        Returns:
